title: Cougar Mountain Software Offer Special Incentives for Idaho Based Businesses
text:
Cougar Mountain Software looks to strengthen local bonds with accounting software and services packages exclusively for Idaho businesses.
Boise, ID (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
Cougar Mountain Software ( http://www.cougarmtn.com ), a leading provider of easy-to-use, smart, and secure accounting software for small businesses and non-profits, recently began offering accounting software and services packages exclusively for Idaho-based businesses.
“We are proud to have been an Idaho business for over 33 years,” states Chuck Gossett, Cougar Mountain Software CEO. “The culture of Cougar Mountain reflects our Idaho heritage: strong, secure, and straightforward. We want to celebrate our local connections and grow our customer base in Idaho. Offering a special incentive to Idaho businesses is a great first step.”
Idaho businesses and nonprofit organizations will receive special pricing on Denali accounting software packages and benefit from personalized customer support delivered from the company’s Boise headquarters. Idaho customers can also take advantage of on-site training facilities, which will provide access to live training events without the high cost of travel expenses.
The latest release of Cougar Mountain Software’s Denali accounting software includes a robust Job Cost module for businesses that require accurate and comprehensive accounting information for custom production and contracting jobs, and integration to Avalara’s Avatax solution, which allows Denali customers to calculate sales tax quickly and accurately using the Avatax cloud-based solution. With AvaTax, tax amounts are added directly to invoices, which reduces the time and effort needed to manually calculate taxes.
Details about the exclusive packages for Idaho businesses can be found on the Cougar Mountain website: https://www.cougarmtn.com/idaho-only-sale/ .
A special offer for Idaho nonprofits is also available, and information is listed here: http://nonprofit-accounting-software.cougarmtn.com/idaho-only-sale-nonprofit/
About Cougar Mountain
Cougar Mountain Software has provided business accounting, nonprofit accounting, and point of sale software solutions to thousands of retail, wholesale, nonprofit, and service-based businesses around the world. Our 32 years of success comes from two key practices: employing in-house accounting and business professionals for our sales, support, training, and development teams, and listening to our clients. Our team of business and accounting experts provides our customers with the personalized service they need to make the right decisions about their accounting solution.
